pp1.9:1.1_0: Instead, they used to apply the previous kinds of people.
pp1.9:2.1_0: A awakened for themselves; one freed both ways; one freed by wisdom; a personal witness; one attained to view; one freed by faith; a follower of the teachings; a follower by faith; a follower by faith; a follower by faith; a follower of the teachings; a follower by faith; a follower by faith; a follower by faith; a follower by faith; a follower by faith; a follower by faith; a follower by faith; a follower by faith.
